title: Adjustment Schema
description: An adjustment represents a modification to a report.

id.description: The unique identifier for the record within the firm.

date.description: The observation or value date for the data in this object. Formatted as YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ in accordance with ISO 8601.

col.description: The column of the report that this adjustment relates to.

comment.description: The description or commentary around the adjustment.

contribution_amount.description: The contribution amount this adjustment should make to the specified report cell. A positive/negative number in minor units (cents/pence).

contribution_text.description: The text to use for the adjustment where the reported cell is not a monetary value.

currency_code.description: The currency of the contribution_amount in accordance with ISO 4217 standards.

page.description: The page of the report that this adjustment relates to.

report_type.description: The report that this adjustment relates to.

reporting_entity_name.description: The name of the reporting legal entity for display purposes.

row.description: The row of the report that this adjustment relates to.

source.description: The source(s) where this data originated. If more than one source needs to be stored for data lineage, it should be separated by a dash. eg. Source1-Source2

version_id.description: The version identifier of the data such as the firm's internal batch identifier.
